title: Make Your Own Soda - Syrup Recipes for All-Natural Pop, Floats,
description:
Make Your Own Soda: Syrup Recipes for All-Natural Pop, Floats, Cocktails, and More

Sweet-tart lime. Bright cherry. Creamy vanilla.
 
Natural sodas are vibrantly flavored with the zing of just-squeezed citrus juice, the sweetness of ripe berries, or the subtle perfume of fresh herbs. And with the popularity of countertop appliances that turn tap water into sparkling water, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s easier than ever to make the real thing in your own kitchen: simply mix a fresh soda syrup with bubbly water for a drink thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s as sweet (or not) as you likeÃ¢â‚¬â€minus any artificial colors, flavors, or sweeteners.
            In Make Your Own Soda, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find 70 recipes for all-natural syrups with unique, artisanal flavors like pineapple, lemongrass, and hibiscus, as well as old-time favorites like ginger, sarsaparilla, and grape. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll also find great ways to use homemade syrups to create soda fountain classics (Chocolate Egg Cream), great cocktails (Lovage Gin Fizz), and hot drinks (Hot Apple Spice Cup), all as delicious as they are distinctive.
